labels.label: Listen for a response from the secure zone that will tell us which data file to send to the secure zone.
Approved reports. Save and notify of new approved reports.
Since we can't send email from the secure zone, we send them here in the staging area
Hold data/template files until an email is received with a matching data file name
Listen for encrypted emails. Send to the secure zone for decypting.
After a report is approved the metadata is sent to the yellow zone (here) where it is put into a database where other tools may access it

entry.value: PopExpress issues transferring ${absolute.path}${filename}. Failed to save to yellow zone PopExpress folder for transfer to red zone.
Unable to route a file coming from one of the PopExpress folders from the redzone: ${absolute.path}${filename}.
